name: Rite of Passage: Hide and Seek - A Creepy Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Rite of Passage: Hide and Seek - A Creepy Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Twenty years ago, a group of children in the town of Greystone were taken by a mysterious fog while playing hide and seek. Only you escaped. Now it’s time to find out why!

• WHAT STRANGE FORCE IS HIDING IN GREYSTONE?
Your brother was among the children who disappeared in the fog many years ago. When your father went looking for him, he too never returned!

• CHOOSE YOUR WORDS WISELY!
Search the town for clues to the disappearances and interact with the townspeople—how you answer them can affect the story’s ending! Solve challenging puzzles and mini-games and rely on your special abilities to aid you on your quest.

• UNCOVER THE HIDDEN SECRETS OF YOUR PAST
You’ve found evidence that your father has been alive this entire time and is still searching for the missing children. But why would he remain silent for so long?

• HELP ANGELA FIND HAPPINESS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER!
Find all the hidden handprints to assemble the Hide and Seek Games mode and play unlimited hidden objects scenes! Plus, enjoy exclusive extras such as beautifully rendered wallpapers and concept art!
